title: SD Podcast Number 19 - Nicole Grove; The cartographic ambiguities of HarassMap
description: Security Dialogue podcast featuring an interview with Nicole Grove about her article ‘The cartographic ambiguities of HarassMap: Crowdmapping security and sexual violence in Egypt’.
